title: Group portrait of Baxter school basketball players, including first row squatting left to right: Don Hudson wearing dark trousers and two tone shirt, #3 "Red" Bonham, #5 Henry Payne, #7 Honey Thompson, #4 Charles A. "Little Teenie" Harris, #6 John Cannon; standing: #24 Jesse Demus, unknown, #18 Bookie Bledsoe, #16 Billy Ward, #17 Jesse Bell, Dave Cowan, #19 Fowler Johnson, and #15 Leonard Harley, posed in gymnasium
medium: black and white: Agfa Safety Film
provenance_text: The Estate of Charles H. Harris, Pittsburgh
